org.chocosolver.solver.variables.delta

Interface IIntervalDelta

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IDelta, IntDelta
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    IntervalDelta, NoDelta

    public interface IIntervalDelta
extends IntDelta
    Interface for delta bounded dedicated to integer variable
    Since:
    11/01/13
    Author:
    Charles Prud'homme

      • getLB

        int getLB(int idx)
   throws IndexOutOfBoundsException
        Return the lower bound of idx^th interval stored in the delta, if any
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        idx^th interval
        Throws:
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - if idx is out of the bounds
